com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.swipedismiss.undo

Class SwipeUndoAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
        • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.swipedismiss.undo.SwipeUndoAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.util.ListViewWrapperSetter, com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.util.Swappable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleSwipeUndoAdapter

    public abstract class SwipeUndoAdapter
extends com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
    Adds swipe-undo behaviour to the AbsListView, using a SwipeUndoTouchListener.

      • undo

        public void undo(android.view.View view)
        Performs the undo animation and restores the original state for given View.
        Parameters:
        view - the parent View which contains both primary and undo Views.

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss(int position)
        Dismisses the View corresponding to given position. Calling this method has the same effect as manually swiping an item off the screen.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the item in the ListAdapter. Must be visible.
